name: Firetrap (itch)
description:
Firetrap - An action filled top down twin stick shooter. Blast your way through 26 hostile areas covering 5 dangerous biomes, each with their own unique attributes and challenges. Collect loot in the form of "Engines" which give and modify abilities, stats, and play style. Combine these engines to play off of each other to become game breaking powerful. Never get stuck on a difficult level with the novel veteran system where persistence and completion-ism is rewarded.
